//Problem code: BIT
#include<iostream>
#include<stdio.h>
#include<string.h>
using namespace std;
int countnumber(int p)
{
    int c=0;
     while(p)
          {
                if(p&1)
                c++;
                p>>=1;

            }
            return c;
}

int main()
{
    long n,c=0,t,b,sum,i;
    scanf("%d",&t);
    while(t--)
    {  sum =0;
       scanf("%d",&n);

       for( i=1; i<=n;i++)
        {
          b=countnumber(i);
          sum+=b;
         }

    printf("%d\n",sum);
    }
}
